alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:33PM CST until January 29 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 945 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork of The Calcasieu River at Sam Houston Jones SP. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.5 feet, Portions of South Perkins Ferry Road become impassable. Recreational areas in Sam Houston Jones State Park are under water, including the playground and campsites nearest the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 6.0 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 5.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun West Fork of The Calcasieu River Sam Houston Jones SP 5.0 MSG unknown 5.6 6.0 5.3 &&
